Yes. Lesser undead bane is "the bane of all undead creatures that can be affected by it."

There's technically 4 different undead banes now, as there's also a lesser and greater version that only affects non-corporeal undead (as noted by "the bane of all non-corporeal undead creatures" in a loresong). I don't recall if any of the NCU versions have gone out.
